metadata.title: CVE-2023-1768 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate error handling in Tribe29 Checkmk <= 2.1.0p25, <= 2.0.0p34,<= 2.2.0b3 (beta), and all versions of Checkmk 1.6.0 causes the symmetricencryption of agent data to fail silently and transmit the data inplaintext in certain configurations.

criterions.comment: check-mk package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
